title: Sean Carter, Pimpin' Sports Talk, Gary Chambers Senate, Ask The CLO 3x and more.
itunes:title: Sean Carter, Pimpin' Sports Talk, Gary Chambers Senate, Ask The CLO 3x and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Something happened in the name of Jesus with The CLO today. Apparently there may be rapper friendly legislation on the way. Pimpin' told us about "the shocker" in Sports Talk. Would You Rather covered a lot of ground today. Someone in Louisiana smoked a blunt and said it loud. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a message specifically for the younger generation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
